'''Vuth Steelire''' was the Battlemaster of the [[Akh'Velahr]] during the [[Weeping War|Fall of Myth Drannor]].
document_data.History:
Vuth was a key strategist during the [[Weeping War]], the mastermind behind the [[Northdark Skirmishes]], and the hero of the [[Mythal's Mettle Campaign]] in [[Alturiak]] of [[712 DR]].

In [[Hammer 29]]â€“[[Midwinter]] of [[713 DR]], thank to their strategies, Battlemaster Vuth, Captain [[Hachaam Selorn]], and Clan Chief [[Jhax Narlgold]] defeated the [[nycaloth]] [[Gaulguth]] and an entire division of the [[Army of Darkness]] was obliterated.
document_data.Personality: Vuth was an arrogant and brash dwarf with no patience for prejudice or politics. He truly inspired his troops and was an honorable individual.
document_data.Possessions: Vuth wielded one of the [[Baneblades of Demron]], ''[[Mhaorathil]]''.
